name: Furious Frogs Feast on Fireflies
description:
This is based on a class on Zenva Academy called "Toads & Fireflies" which is based on an based on an Atari 2600 game "Frogs and Flies".

This is a multiplayer game. 

Player One controls the Green Frog using the Space Bar.

Player Two controls the Red Frog using the Enter key.

Frogs jump using their button, then shoot out their tongues if you press the button again while they are in the air.

Collect as many points as you can before time runs out by jumping and catching fireflies with your tongue! Faster fireflies are worth more points!
